07 F: Ki tu'u n koe i te ahiahi e mo ai o F: When you get back in the afternoon, if
Tavake takoa, ararua krua 'ana mataki Tavake (brother) is there too, you two can
i te pu'ahu era, ta'e hoko tahi n koe. open the package, not you alone.
